thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Hedge Funds and Investors Adapt to New Realities: WSJ Tax Watch

author: Theo Francis
title: Hedge Funds and Investors Adapt to New Realities: WSJ Tax Watch
text:
In Washington, Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin said his agency will move quickly to shut down a loophole that could otherwise let hedge funds escape new, tougher rules for favorable tax treatment on much of their income.
Investors have shed U.S. government bonds since the tax overhaul passed, and that selloff has accelerated with worries about inflation and tax-cut fueled deficits. The tax legislation has also complicated a key technique for evaluating corporate earnings quality.
...
